title: They served their country
creator_credit: Audio-Visual Aids, University of Melbourne and Returned Sailors, Soldiers and Airmens Imperial League of Australia
brief_description: Shows the efforts made by the RSL to keep alive the spirit of comradeship, by serving the needy, sick, and bereaved, providing for the needs of past and present servicemen and women and their dependents. Tours various RSL care facilities in and around Melbourne and Bendigo.
creator_credit_for_label: Audio-Visual Aids, University of Melbourne and Returned Sailors, Soldiers and Airmens Imperial League of Australia
